quotes.cn: 求知若饥，虚心若愚
quotes.en: Stay hungry, stay foolish

quotes.cn: 活着就是为了改变世界，难道还有其他原因吗？
quotes.en: We're here to put a dent in the universe. Otherwise why else even be here?

quotes.cn: 领袖和跟风者的区别就在于创新。
quotes.en: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.

quotes.cn: 你的时间有限，不要浪费在过别人的生活上。
quotes.en: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.

quotes.cn: 要有勇气追随你的内心和直觉。
quotes.en: Have the courage to follow your heart and intuition.

quotes.cn: 伟大的工作来自于对自己所做之事的热爱。
quotes.en: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.

quotes.cn: 简单是终极的复杂。
quotes.en: Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.

quotes.cn: 设计不仅仅是它看起来是什么，它是如何工作。
quotes.en: Design is not just what it looks like and feels like. Design is how it works.

quotes.cn: 专注和简单一直是我的秘诀之一。
quotes.en: Focus and simplicity have been my mantra.

quotes.cn: 细节很重要，值得等待值得做好。
quotes.en: Details matter, it's worth waiting to get it right.

quotes.cn: 只有疯狂到认为自己能改变世界的人，才能真正改变世界。
quotes.en: The people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world are the ones who do.

quotes.cn: stay hungry, stay foolish
quotes.en: Stay hungry, stay foolish

quotes.cn: 你必须找到你热爱的事业。
quotes.en: You've got to find what you love.

quotes.cn: 质量比数量更重要。
quotes.en: Quality is more important than quantity.

quotes.cn: 创新就是把不同的事物联系起来。
quotes.en: Creativity is just connecting things.

quotes.cn: 工作将占据你生活的很大一部分，真正满意的唯一方式是做你认为伟大的工作。
quotes.en: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work.

quotes.cn: 如果今天是我生命的最后一天，我会做我现在正在做的事吗？
quotes.en: If today were the last day of my life, would I want to do what I am about to do today?

quotes.cn: 记住你即将死去，是我知道的避免陷入患得患失的最好方法。
quotes.en: Remembering that you are going to die is the best way I know to avoid the trap of thinking you have something to lose.

quotes.cn: 被拒绝是生活的一部分，但你不能让它阻止你。
quotes.en: Getting fired from Apple was the best thing that could have ever happened to me.

quotes.cn: 保持初学者心态。
quotes.en: Stay hungry, stay foolish.
